DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - Onyx Rainbow Striped Crew Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Black low cut socks has stripes of red, orange, yellow on one and the other has stripes of green, blue and purple. Made of 43% Olefin which has low moisture absorption these socks wick away sweat and dry quickly, making them great for all athletics. Also made of 20% Polyester, 19% Sul-Cool Polyeste 7% Acrylic, 6% Spandex and 5% Nylon. Sized to fit Women sizes 5-9, Men sizes 6-8.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Medium or Large Low Cut Rainbow Striped Socks
Great for wearing with every day shoes and doing every day activities
The black low cut socks have rainbow stripes of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple at the top of each sock
Will fit USA Women sizes 5-9, USA Men sizes 6-8, UK Women sizes 6-85, UK Men sizes 5-7 and EUR sizes 35-40.5
43% Olefin, 20% Polyester, 19% Sul-Cool Polyester, 7% Acrylic, 6% Spandex, 5% Nylon and made in the USA
